root.name: Rig'n'Roll
root.description: OverviewRig'n'Roll is the sequel to the famous Hard Truck series that sets players in the shoes of a young man trying to create his own Californian trucking business. The game world is true-to-life, featuring 12,000 miles of California roads in a scale of 1:10 (2,000 miles), has 40 cities and towns including famous ones like San Francisco and Los Angeles. In order to become the greatest trucker on the highways, players must prove their authority to other truckers by delivering cargo on time and participating in high-powered truck races. The game features 14 trucks.The game was believed to be a vaporware as it was in development since early 2001. Despite developers promises and overall hype about the new game in the franchise it was received with some negativity.
